line_1: With Sacred Compounds his fierce Orb allays,
line_2: Then crowns the Joyful Hero with his Rays:

line_1: Shall purge their minds from all impure allays
line_2: By fair example and ingenuous praise,

line_1: Shall purge their minds from all impure allays
line_2: Through the world's intricate or rugged ways

line_1: Shall purge their minds from all impure allays
